description: This file defines the main Backbone.js view for a TodoMVC application, managing UI interactions, rendering, and collection event bindings.

classes.name: AppView
classes.description: Main Backbone view managing the TodoMVC application's user interface and interactions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Sets up DOM element references, binds collection events, and fetches initial data.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the UI to reflect the current state of the Todos collection, including statistics and filter selection.

methods.name: addOne
methods.description: Creates and appends a view for a single Todo item.

methods.name: addAll
methods.description: Clears the list and adds all Todo items from the collection.

methods.name: filterOne
methods.description: Triggers visibility update for a single Todo item.

methods.name: filterAll
methods.description: Applies filtering to all Todo items.

methods.name: newAttributes
methods.description: Generates attributes for a new Todo item based on input field.

methods.name: createOnEnter
methods.description: Creates a new Todo item when Enter key is pressed and input is valid.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Sets all Todo items to completed or not based on the toggle checkbox.
